dmca.title: Violation of hypnosis software patent
dmca.body:
Hello,
You may not be aware, but I was awarded the US patent 6,565,504 for hypnosis software. I believe your hypnosis products are substantially in violation of this patent. I am sorry, but I am compelled to request that you take appropriate action to comply with US patent law and desist from distribution of the offending software products.
Sincerely,
Richard A. Blumenthal, MS, NCC
